author: wrowe
msg: Historically consistent flag to shutdown the server [stop is supported,

author: trawick
msg: APR-ize the resolver logic in mod_unique_id.  This fixes a bug
in logging the error from a failed DNS lookup.
Note: For a funky error scenario to work right (huge host name),
this requires a tweak to apr_gethostname() which I have not yet

author: jwoolley
msg: Get rid of some cruft.  Setting these flag slots is best left to the core.

author: ianh
msg: Add extra If-XXX request headers to be ignored in subrequests
Allow cache-control header to get passed to subrequests
